markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Angelic Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1357) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 36 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Angelkin](/Feats.aspx?ID=1348)

</column>

---

You can tap into the magic of angels that runs through your blood. You can cast [_humanoid form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=153) and [_remove fear_](/Spells.aspx?ID=252) each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.
name: Angelic Magic
